title: Bug 122584 - Cascading parameter values not displayed properly in HTML viewer
description: Description: Cascading parameter values can't be displayed properly in HTML viewer. Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When selecting the first parameter value, the expected behavior is that the second parameter value in the same cascading parameter group should be displayed. However, it is currently not displayed.
EB: The cascading parameter values should be displayed correctly in the HTML viewer when selecting the first parameter.
SR:
1. Open the HTML viewer.
2. Navigate to the cascading parameter section.
3. Select the first parameter value and observe if the second parameter value is displayed correctly.
